data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/cabkKlqKhiNkgGSCMhybqkwllkE.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":8500000,"genres":[{"id":28,"name":"Action"},{"id":80,"name":"Crime"},{"id":18,"name":"Drama"},{"id":53,"name":"Thriller"}],"homepage":"","id":1619,"imdb_id":"tt0202677","origin_country":["US"],"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Way of the Gun","overview":"Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.","popularity":13.161,"poster_path":"/wrjMMdgn1a4ChlaBmlzKnb78nr6.jpg","production_companies":[],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"US","name":"United States of America"}],"release_date":"2000-09-08","revenue":19125401,"runtime":119,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"Spanish","iso_639_1":"es","name":"Español"},{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"Choose your side carefully, because the only way out is the way of the gun.","title":"The Way of the Gun","video":false,"vote_average":6.317,"vote_count":412}
